The People of the State of Illinois, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Angelo Cruz, Defendant-Appellant.(No. 55201;First DistrictJune 7, 1971.Gerald W. Getty, Public Defender, of Chicago, (Suzanne M. Kohut and James J. Doherty, Assistant Public Defenders, of counsel,) for appellant.Edward V. Hanrahan, State’s Attorney, of Chicago, (Robert A. Novelle and George Pappas, Assistant State’s Attorneys, of counsel,) for the People.

Abstract of Decision

Opinion by Mr. JUSTICE LYONS.
